# Introduction

Intro.

# Installation

You can install `magrene` with:

```{r "install", eval = FALSE}
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) {
      install.packages("BiocManager")
  }

BiocManager::install("magrene")
```

# Data description

```{r data}
data(gma_grn)
head(gma_grn)

data(gma_ppi)
head(gma_ppi)

data(gma_paralogs)
head(gma_paralogs)
```

# Finding motifs

```{r}
lambda <- find_lambda(gma_grn[, 1:2], gma_paralogs[, 1:2])

```
